mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, biz_id, location_no, item_code, item_id, item_name, spec, prep_code, num, unit_code, buy_price_all, sell_price_all, split_num, split_price, split_unit_code, stock_max, stock_min, stock_occupy from stro_stock where id = #{id} and hosp_code= #{hospCode}
mapper.update: update stro_stock set location_no = #{locationNo},stock_max = #{stockMax},stock_min = #{stockMin},stock_occupy = #{stockOccupy} where id = #{id} and hosp_code= #{hospCode}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.hosp_code hospCode, a.biz_id bizId, a.location_no locationNo, a.item_code itemCode, a.item_id itemId, a.item_name itemName, ifnull(a.num,0) num,ifnull(a.buy_price_all,0) buyPriceAll,ifnull(a.sell_price_all,0) sellPriceAll,ifnull(a.split_num,0) splitNum, a.split_price splitPrice,a.split_ratio splitRatio, TRUNCATE(a.sell_price_all/a.num,4) sellPrice, TRUNCATE(a.buy_price_all/a.num,4) buyPrice, TRUNCATE(a.split_price/a.split_num,4) splitPrice from stro_stock a where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and biz_id = #{bizId} and item_code = #{itemCode} and item_id = #{itemId}

select a.id, a.hosp_code hospCode, a.biz_id bizId, a.item_code itemCode, a.item_id itemId, a.item_name itemName, a.num, a.buy_price_all buyPriceAll, a.sell_price_all sellPriceAll, a.split_num splitNum, a.split_price splitPrice, a.unit_code unitCode, a.batch_no batchNo, a.expiry_date expiryDate, a.split_unit_code splitUnitCode,a.split_ratio splitRatio,a.buy_price buyPrice,a.sell_price sellPrice from stro_stock_detail a where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and biz_id = #{bizId} and item_code = #{itemCode} and item_id = #{itemId} and a.split_num > 0
and a.expiry_date >= now()
and batch_no = #{batchNo}
order by a.id

mapper.select: select distinct ifnull((a.split_num-ifnull(a.stock_occupy,0)-#{stockNum}),0) num from stro_stock a join stro_stock_detail b on a.biz_id=b.biz_id and a.item_code=b.item_code and a.item_id=b.item_id and a.hosp_code=b.hosp_code where a.item_code=#{itemCode} and a.item_id=#{itemId} and a.biz_id=#{bizId} and a.hosp_code=#{hospCode} and date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(b.expiry_date, '%Y-%m-%d')

insert into stro_in_record(id,hosp_code, item_id, item_code, num, buy_price, sell_price, stock_id, stock_detail_id,crte_time) values
(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode},#{item.itemId},#{item.itemCode},#{item.num},#{item.buyPrice},#{item.sellPrice},#{item.stockId},#{item.stockDetailId},#{item.crteTime})

select a.hosp_code, a.item_code, a.item_id, a.item_name, a.split_price, a.split_ratio, a.biz_id, a.sell_price, a.batch_no, a.expiry_date, max(a.buy_price) as buy_price, max(a.unit_code) as unit_code, max(a.split_unit_code) split_unit_code, sum(a.num) num, sum(a.split_num) split_num, sum(buy_price_all) as buy_price_all, sum(sell_price_all) as sell_price_all, case when a.item_code = '1' then (select bp.name from base_product bp where bd.prod_code = bp.code and bd.hosp_code = bp.hosp_code) when a.item_code = '2' then (select bp.name from base_product bp where bm.prod_code = bp.code and bm.hosp_code = bp.hosp_code) end prodName, case when a.item_code='1' then bd.code when a.item_code='2' then bm.code end code, case when a.item_code='1' then bd.spec when a.item_code='2' then bm.spec end spec, (case a.item_code when '1' then bd.type_code when '2' then bm.type_code end ) typeCode, case when a.item_code='1' then bd.prep_code when a.item_code='2' then '' end prep_code from stro_stock_detail a left join base_drug bd on a.item_id = bd.id and a.hosp_code = bd.hosp_code and a.item_code = "1" left join base_material bm on a.item_id = bm.id and a.hosp_code = bm.hosp_code and a.item_code = "2" where a.biz_id = #{bizId} and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.split_num > 0
and a.item_code = #{itemCode}
and a.expiry_date <= #{warDate}
and ( a.item_name like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%') or bd.usual_pym like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%') or bd.usual_wbm like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%') or bd.good_pym like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%') or bd.good_wbm like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%') or bm.pym like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%') or bm.wbm like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%') )
group by a.item_id,a.batch_no,a.expiry_date,a.item_name,a.split_ratio,a.sell_price,a.hosp_code,a.item_code,a.biz_id
order by expiry_date asc
order by expiry_date desc
select type_identity from base_dept where id =#{bizId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select a.id, a.hosp_code, a.biz_id, a.location_no, a.item_code, a.item_id, a.item_name, a.spec, a.prep_code,a.unit_code, a.buy_price_all, a.sell_price_all, a.split_price,a.split_unit_code, a.stock_max, a.stock_min, a.stock_occupy,round(ifnull((b.surplus_num*b.split_ratio),a.split_num),0) as split_num, ifnull(b.surplus_num,a.num) as num,a.split_ratio from stro_stock a left join (select surplus_num,biz_id,hosp_code,item_id,split_ratio from stro_invoicing where id in ( select max(id) from stro_invoicing where crte_time <= #{crteTime} group by item_id,hosp_code,biz_id,item_code)) b on a.item_id = b.item_id and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.biz_id = b.biz_id where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select id, hosp_code, biz_id, location_no, item_code, item_id, item_name, spec, prep_code, num, unit_code, buy_price_all, sell_price_all, split_num, split_price, split_unit_code, stock_max, stock_min, stock_occupy, stock_time,crte_time from stro_stock_time where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and stock_time = #{stockTime}

select a.item_name,a.num as totalNum,a.split_num as totalSplitNum, c.num as expiryNum,c.split_num as expirySplitNum,c.batch_no,c.expiry_date,a.stock_occupy AS stockOccupy, case a.item_code when '1' then bd.code when '2' then bm.code end code, case a.item_code when '1' then bd.prod_code when '2' then bm.prod_code end prod_code from stro_stock a left join (select sum(split_num) stroNum,item_id,biz_id,item_code,hosp_code,expiry_date from stro_stock_detail where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and biz_id = #{bizId} and date(expiry_date) < date(now()) and item_id= #{itemId} group by item_id) b on a.item_id = b.item_id left join stro_stock_detail c on c.item_id = a.item_id and c.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and c.biz_id = a.biz_id and date(c.expiry_date) < date(now()) and c.num > 0 left join base_drug bd on bd.id = a.item_id left join base_material bm on bm.id = a.id where ifnull((a.split_num-ifnull(a.stock_occupy,0)-ifnull(b.stroNum,0) - #{stockNum} ),0) < 0 and a.item_id = #{itemId} and a.biz_id = #{bizId}

(#{item.id},#{item.hospCode},#{item.bizId}, #{item.locationNo},#{item.itemCode}, #{item.itemId},#{item.itemName}, #{item.spec},#{item.prepCode},#{item.num},#{item.unitCode},#{item.buyPriceAll},#{item.sellPriceAll},#{item.splitRatio}, #{item.splitNum},#{item.splitPrice},#{item.splitUnitCode},#{item.stockMax},#{item.stockMin},#{item.stockOccupy}, #{item.stockTime},#{item.crteTime})
